mapper.select:
select a.status from `wk_hrm_recruit_post` a where 1 = 1
and a.dept_id in
#{deptId}
and 1=2
mapper.sql: select a.*, b.name as deptName, c.name as postTypeName, (select count(1) from `wk_hrm_recruit_candidate` c where c.post_id = a.post_id and c.status = 8) as hasEntryNum, d.employee_name as ownerEmployeeName, (select group_concat(e.employee_name) from wk_hrm_employee e where find_in_set(e.employee_id, a.interview_employee_ids) and e.is_del = 0) as interviewEmployeeName from `wk_hrm_recruit_post` a left join `wk_hrm_dept` b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id left join wk_hrm_recruit_post_type c on a.post_type_id = c.id left join wk_hrm_employee d on a.owner_employee_id = d.employee_id and d.is_del = 0
